alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued March 25 at 8:36AM PDT until March 26 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 possible. * WHERE...Mendocino Coast and Southwestern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.
